short.ar: إرسال رسائل صوتية عن طريق ديسكورد
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Send Voice Messages on Discord web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Discord Voice Messages extensions adds the ability for google chrome users to send voice messages directly from the browser,
The functionality is provided through the addition of a record icon next to the emojis icon, the record icon looks like a native element of the page, which makes the usage of the extension quite easy.
